trans-unit.source: Provides automatic conversion between a nullable type and its underlying primitive type.
trans-unit.target: Gir automatisk konvertering mellom en type som kan nullstilles, og den underliggende primitiv typen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.NullableConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.NullableConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The specified nullable type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte typen som kan nullstilles.

trans-unit.source: type is not a nullable type.
trans-unit.target: typeer ikke en type som kan nullstilles.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to the type of this converter, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt av den angitte typen for denne konverteringsprogram, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere fra.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere objektet til den angitte typen, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til typen i denne konverteringsprogram, ved hjelp av den angitte kontekst og kultur informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>skal brukes som gjeldende kultur.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>til å konvertere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer konverterte verdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer gitt verdi-objektet til den angitte typen, ved hjelp av den angitte kontekst og kultur informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>skal brukes som gjeldende kultur.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>til å konvertere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>ikke konvertere parameteren verdien til å.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer konverterte verdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: destinationType is .
trans-unit.target: destinationTypeis .

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the type that this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> is associated with, using the specified context, given a set of property values for the object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av typen som dette <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> er knyttet til, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten gitt et sett med verdier for objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of new property values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>med nye verdier.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the given <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer den angitte <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis objektet ikke kan opprettes.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether changing a value on this object requires a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*> to create a new value, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om endring av et på dette objektet krever et kall til <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>til å opprette en ny verdi ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if changing a property on this object requires a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*> to create a new value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapen på dette objektet endres krever et kall til <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>til å opprette en ny verdi; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of properties for the type of array specified by the value parameter, using the specified context and attributes.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling med egenskaper for hva slags matrise som er angitt av parameteren verdi ved hjelp av angitte konteksten og attributter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that specifies the type of array for which to get properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som angir hvilken type matrise som du vil hente egenskaper.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that is used as a filter.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Attribute>som brukes som et filter.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> with the properties that are exposed for this data type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> egenskaper som vises for denne datatypen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this object supports properties, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om dette objektet støtter egenskaper, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties*> should be called to find the properties of this object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties*>skal kall til å finne egenskaper for dette objektet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type this type converter is designed for when provided with a format context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av standardverdier for datatypen for denne typen konverteringsprogram er utformet for når angitt med en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en kontekst som format som kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om miljøet som denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren eller egenskaper for denne parameteren kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>som inneholder et standard sett med gyldige verdier, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis datatypen ikke støtter et standard sett med verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om samlingen av standardverdier ble returnert fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>er en spesiell liste over verdier, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>returnert fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>er en fullstendig liste med mulige verdier. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis andre verdier er mulig.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om dette objektet støtter et standard sett med verdier som kan velges fra en liste med den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>skal kall til å finne et vanlig sett med verdier objektet støtter; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given value object is valid for this type and for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om objektet angitte verdien er ugyldig for denne typen og for den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test for validity.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>å teste for gyldighetsperiode.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified value is valid for this object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte verdien er ugyldig for dette objektet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the nullable type.
trans-unit.target: Henter type som kan nullstilles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the nullable type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer type som kan nullstilles.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying type.
trans-unit.target: Henter den underliggende typen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the underlying type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer den underliggende typen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying type converter.
trans-unit.target: Henter det underliggende type konverteringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> that represents the underlying type converter.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> som representerer det underliggende type konverteringsprogrammet.
